price: Na miji mingapi iliyo jifakharisha tumeiangamiza! Na hayo maskani yao hayakukaliwa tena baada yao, ila kwa uchache tu. Na Sisi ndio tumekuwa warithi wao.
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةِۭ بَطِرَتۡ مَعِيشَتَهَاۖ فَتِلۡكَ مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡ لَمۡ تُسۡكَن مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ وَكُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ
footnotes: Watu hawa hawazingatii yaliyo wapata kaumu zilizo kwisha tangulia. Iliangamizwa miji ya walio ghurika na neema za Mwenyezi Mungu, na kisha wakazikanusha na wakamkanusha Mwenyezi Mungu. Na haya majumba yao yamekuwa matupu, magofu, hayafai kukaliwa ila nadra tu kwa wapita njia. Na yamebaki hayana mwenye kuyamiliki baada yao ila Mwenyezi Mungu Mwenye utukufu na ukarimu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā min qaryatin baṭirat maʿīshatahā fatil'ka masākinuhum lam tus'kan min baʿdihim illā qalīlan wakunnā naḥnu al-wārithīna
